pr_title: [FLINK-17715][sql client] Supports function DDLs in SQL-CLI

timeline.message:
[FLINK-17715][sql client] Supports function DDLs in SQL-CLI

This patch supports CREATE/DROP/ALTER function DDLs for SQL-CLI.

[FLINK-17715][sql client] Supports function DDLs in SQL-CLI

This patch supports CREATE/DROP/ALTER function DDLs for SQL-CLI.

timeline.bodyText: add some tests for CREATE TEMPORARY SYSTEM FUNCTION
timeline.author: godfreyhe

timeline.bodyText: I still think we should introduce executeSql method instead of three methods, and i will remove other methods in #12188
timeline.author: godfreyhe
